FROM mes_production_feeding_detail detail LEFT JOIN mes_production_feeding feeding ON feeding.id= detail.`head_id` LEFT JOIN cus_materiel headmaterial ON headmaterial.`id` = feeding.`materiel_id` LEFT JOIN cus_materiel material ON material.`id` = detail.`materiel_id` LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary unituom ON unituom.id = material.unit_uom LEFT JOIN cus_facility facility ON facility.id = material.default_facility LEFT JOIN cus_facility_location location ON location.id = material.default_location
and detail.head_id = #{headId} and feeding.`feeding_no` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{planNo},'%' ) and feeding.`status` = #{auditSign} and material.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{materialsName},'%' ) and DATE_FORMAT(feeding.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(feeding.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')

FROM mes_production_feeding_detail detail LEFT JOIN mes_production_feeding feeding ON feeding.id= detail.`head_id` LEFT JOIN mes_production_plan plan ON feeding.production_plan_id= plan.`id` LEFT JOIN sys_dept dept ON feeding.pro_dept= dept.`dept_id` LEFT JOIN cus_materiel material ON material.`id` = detail.`materiel_id` LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary unituom ON unituom.id = material.unit_uom
and detail.head_id = #{headId} and feeding.`feeding_no` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{planNo},'%' ) and feeding.`status` = #{auditSign} and material.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{materialsName},'%' ) and (detail.`plan_feeding` > detail.`out_count` OR feeding.is_quota = 0) and DATE_FORMAT(feeding.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(feeding.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
